title: Emerald Bloom Diamond Haaram - A Timeless Elegance
materials: oval-cut emeralds of fine quality. Hyderabadi Kundan Polish for a lasting luster.
features: This exquisite Haaram features a floral design intricately set with dazzling diamonds. The focal point is the vibrant green emeralds, adding a touch of regal charm. The delicate filigree work and unique pendant showcases traditional Telugu craftsmanship, making it a statement piece of unparalleled beauty. The Haaram is designed with a graduating floral pattern with emeralds centered in the large floral pendant and center piece.
colors: Primary color is the warm yellow of 22K gold
contrasted by the sparkling white of the diamonds and the rich green of the emeralds. Traditional South Indian color palette.
occasions: and other significant celebrations like Seemantham and half-saree functions (Voni Function). A stunning addition to any special occasion ensemble.
description: A blend of traditional South Indian design and contemporary elegance, this Haaram is a true masterpiece. The brilliant-cut diamonds capture the light beautifully, while the fine emeralds add a touch of sophistication. Its craftsmanship and enduring design make it a treasured heirloom, passed down through generations. Own a piece of Hyderabad's rich jewelry heritage.
